word_mean: 氯醛，三氯乙醛：化学名三氯乙醛，Cl3C-·CHO，为具刺激臭味的无色油状液体，乙醇与氯相互作用而制得，用于制备水合氯醛和滴滴涕(DDT)

sentence.Network_en: Chloral hydrate is a rapidly effective hypnotic.
sentence.Network_cn: 水合氯醛为一种作用迅速的催眠药.

sentence.Network_en: Chloral is a colorless, volatile liquid with a very penetrating odor and boiling at 97.7℃.
sentence.Network_cn: 三氯乙醛是无色挥发性的液体,带有刺激性很强的气味,在97.7℃沸腾.

sentence.Network_en: Condensation of phenol and chloral over HY zeolite catalysts was studied in detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 以三氯乙醛为亲电试剂,在HY沸石催化剂上实现了苯酚和三氯乙醛的二次缩合反应.
